content: I launched the CDS Hooks Sandbox app from my HSPC sandbox STU3 instance, however the app always gets stuck on "Loading cards...". Same response when testing both the patient-hello-world service or the OpenInfoButton service. Anyone else get this to run?

Hi @Dave Carlson , can you try clearing your browser cache and trying again? I have a feeling this may be related to an issue we encountered at the connectathon this past weekend, where we saw a little mix up in patient IDs for some newly created HSPC Sandboxes. But this was recently fixed. For more context: https://github.com/cds-hooks/sandbox/issues/100.

Hi @Zach Plata , I cleared my Chrome browser cache, and the CDS hooks sandbox app still gets stuck Loading. I opened the sandbox.cds-hooks.org web app independent, without launching from HSPC sandbox, and the default DSTU2 FHIR server works fine. But changing my server to HSPC STU3 gets stuck on Loading again. Is there a problem accessing STU3 servers?

@Dave Carlson When you say changing your server to HSPC STU3, do you mean, in the CDS Hooks Sandbox, doing the "Change FHIR server" option, then choosing a patient from the pick list? Are you using the open endpoint of your STU3 FHIR server or the secured?
The CDS Hooks Sandbox should be able to support STU3 FHIR servers
@Zach Plata Yes, using the Change FHIR Server button, I then select a patient which is correctly displayed in the left panel. And yes, I am using my open endpoint.
I can test it out on my end. What's your open endpoint?
https://api-stu3.hspconsortium.org/careplantest/open I am selecting patient Betsy Johnson. Thanks.

For visibility: I've logged this issue for working to make the CDS Hooks Sandbox flexible for HSPC sandboxes that do not include the starter patient data in their FHIR servers. https://github.com/cds-hooks/sandbox/issues/103
